items.content_html: TaskMan is a lightweight and user-friendly task manager built using Next.js and TypeScript. With TaskMan, you can effortlessly create tasks and subtasks, reorder them using drag and drop functionality, and delete tasks as needed.
items.title: victordantasdev/taskman: TaskMan is a lightweight and user-friendly task manager built using Next.js and TypeScript. With TaskMan, you can effortlessly create tasks and subtasks, reorder them using drag and drop functionality, and delete tasks as needed.
